title: LMS Utilization Strategies for Online Art and Design Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic proficiency in digital tools and foundational understanding of art/design theory
context.additional_context: LMS-integrated arts/design competency enhancement program with project-based assessment and real-time interactive tools

learning_goals: Learners can create three types of digital portfolios using interactive media tools within an LMS.
Learners can submit design improvement proposals incorporating peer feedback via LMS quiz/forum features.
Learners can participate in critique sessions and present artwork explanations using LMS video conferencing tools in mobile environments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
